text: Mohamad Azmi bin Muslim (born 17 October 1986 in Penang, Malaysia) is a Malaysian footballer who plays as a left back for Penang in the Malaysia Premier League.Mohd Azmi Muslim, Kedah Midfielder and Defender, retrieved 7 April 2010. ==Club career== ===Early career=== Azmi began his football career with UPB-MyTeam before signed with Kedah. ==International career== He was a member of the Malaysia national under-23 football team and a member of the 2009 Laos Sea Games Football Gold medal winning squad.SEA Games shocker: Malaysia defeats Thailand to make semis, The Malaysian Insider , retrieved 7 April 2010. He has played for the Malaysian national football team, and in 2009 he played twice against Uzbekistan in the 2011 AFC Asian Cup qualification. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan=2|Club !rowspan=2|Season !colspan=3|League !colspan=2|Cup !colspan=2|League Cup !colspan=2|Continental !colspan=2|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="4"|Selangor |2014 |Malaysia Super League |17||0||1||0||7||0||4||1||29||1 |- |2015 |Malaysia Super League |9||0||0||0||2||0||–||–||11||0 |- |2016 |Malaysia Super League |9||0||2||0||7||0||4||0||22||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total||35||0||3||0||16||0||8||1||62||1 |- |rowspan="2"|PKNS |2017 |Malaysia Super League |19||0||1||0||4||0||–||–||24||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total||19||0||1||0||4||0||–||–||24||0 |- |rowspan="2"|Melaka United |2018 |Malaysia Super League |14||0||1||0||0||0||–||–||15||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total||14||0||1||0||0||0||–||–||15||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career Total||0||0||0||0||0||0||–||–||0||0 |} ==Honours== ===International=== * 2014 AFF Suzuki Cup (Runner Up) * 2009 Southeast Asian Games - Winner ===Club=== Selangor FA * Malaysia Cup : 2015 Penang FA * Malaysia Premier League :2020 ==References== Category:Malaysian footballers Category:Living people Category:1986 births Category:Sportspeople from Penang Category:UPB-MyTeam FC players Category:Johor Darul Ta'zim F.C. players Category:Selangor FA players Category:PKNS F.C. players Category:Kedah FA players Category:People from Penang Category:Malaysian people of Malay descent Category:Malaysian Muslims Category:Malaysia Super League players Category:Association football defenders Category:Association football midfielders
